sentences.en: Get ready to savor those bonito flakes.
sentences.cn: 准备好去体味那些鲣鱼薄片。

sentences.en: I have eaten the whole bonito.
sentences.cn: 我已经把这整条金枪鱼吃了.

sentences.en: It is first boiled, and then dipped in a soup made of soy sauce, salt, sweet sake, and bonito shavings as it is being eaten.
sentences.cn: 吃荞麦面条时先煮熟，然后蘸上由酱油、盐、甜酒和鲣鱼干做成的汤汁。

sentences.en: It will be harder to eat than the bonito.
sentences.cn: 它比那条金枪鱼要难吃些.

sentences.en: Lo m á s bonito es verles felices, con una sonrisa.
sentences.cn: 最美好的事情莫过于看到他们开心,看到他们面带微笑.

sentences.en: The most common types of fish used are sea beam, tuna, and bonito.
sentences.cn: 生鱼片里使用的主要是大头鱼、金枪鱼和鲣鱼。

sentences.en: Whole dried bonito fillets may be baked to soften and shaved to make the bonito shavings.
sentences.cn: 所有的金枪鱼干烤软、切成薄片后制成干鱼片.

trans.tran_en: any of various small tunny-like marine food fishes of the genus Sarda, of warm Atlantic and Pacific waters: family Scombridae (tunnies and mackerels)
